fields.name: DashboardClasses
fields.description: $text $default(h-full bg-cover bg-center overflow-auto p-3) Default: h-full bg-cover bg-center overflow-auto p-3

fields.name: Grid
fields.description: $default(grid grid-flow-row-dense md:grid-cols-12) Default: grid grid-flow-row-dense md:grid-cols-12

fields.name: GroupAccess
fields.description: $instanceDescription Group allowed to access this dashboard

fields.name: BoardClasses
fields.description: $text $default(col-span-12 md:col-span-4 rounded-md border border-gray-300 bg-white bg-opacity-70 p-4 m-1)  Default:col-span-12 md:col-span-4 rounded-md border border-gray-300 bg-white bg-opacity-70 p-4 m-1
fields.defaultValue: col-span-12 md:col-span-4 rounded-md border border-gray-300 bg-white bg-opacity-70 p-4 m-1

fields.name: LabelClasses
fields.description: $text $default(text-center font-bold pb-2) Default: text-center font-bold pb-2

fields.name: MenuClasses
fields.description: $text $default(flex flex-col gap-y-2) Default: flex flex-col gap-y-2

fields.name: TextClasses
fields.description: $text $default(rounded-md border border-gray-300 border-l-2 border-l-sky-600 shadow-sm hover:bg-sky-800 hover:text-white p-2 bg-white) Default: rounded-md border border-gray-300 border-l-2 border-l-sky-600 shadow-sm hover:bg-sky-800 hover:text-white p-2 bg-white
fields.defaultValue: rounded-md border border-gray-300 border-l-2 border-l-sky-600 shadow-sm hover:bg-sky-800 hover:text-white p-2 bg-white

fields.name: TextAttention
fields.description: Crisis:<=-5, ActionableBad:-4 .. -1, No action Required:0, ActionableGood:1..4,Extraordinary:>=5

fields.name: GroupVisibility
fields.description: Group allowed to view this menu line

fields.name: LineClasses
fields.description: $text $default(text-right transition ease-in-out rounded ring-offset-0 hover:ring-1 ring-stone-300) Default: text-right transition ease-in-out rounded ring-offset-0 hover:ring-1 ring-stone-300
fields.defaultValue: text-right transition ease-in-out rounded ring-offset-0 hover:ring-1 ring-stone-300

fields.name: TitleClasses
fields.description: $text $default(text-left text-stone-600 p-1) Default: text-left text-stone-600 p-1

fields.name: ValueClasses
fields.description: $text $default(Default Info text-sm text-stone-800) Default: Default Info text-sm text-stone-800  <=>  border-sky-500   bg-sky-50   inline-block m-1  whitespace-nowrap  font-mono font-semibold  px-2 py-1  border rounded-md  ring-sky-600 ring-offset-0 hover:ring-1 ring-stone-300  text-sm text-stone-800

fields.name: ValueAttention
fields.description: Crisis:<=-5, ActionableBad:-4 .. -1, No action Required:0, ActionableGood:1..4,Extraordinary:>=5

fields.name: ValueAttentionClasses
fields.description: $text $default(fa-solid fa-circle pr-1 animate-pulse text-lg align-middle) Default: fa-solid fa-circle pr-1 animate-pulse text-lg align-middle
fields.defaultValue: fa-solid fa-circle pr-1 animate-pulse text-lg align-middle

fields.name: InputQueryKibana
fields.description: Atenção: espaços no Kibana são OR e não AND

fields.name: MaxVisibleDayEvents
fields.description: $number(0) Specify the maximum number of events that will be visible before enabling the +more link. Set to -1 to list all events. Defaults to 3.

fields.name: CreateDefinition
fields.description: Name of the Definition of Instances to Create

fields.name: EventViews
fields.description: List of views to show (first is default). Example: dayGridWeek,dayGridMonth,listMonth

fields.name: DateStartEventField
fields.description: Name of the definition date field that represents the beginning of the event

fields.name: DateEndEventField
fields.description: Name of the definition date field that represents the end of the event

fields.name: DescriptionEventField
fields.description: Name of the definition field to use as the event description

fields.name: StateEventField
fields.description: Name of the field to calculate the color for the event. If not defined it will use always the same color for all events

fields.name: EventsQuery
fields.description: Define a query to restrict the results that will appear in the calendar. Defaults to all records in the definition
